cases.title: RESEARCH CASES
cases.subtitle: Analysis of optimized digital processes. Each case represents recovered hours and maximized efficiency.

case1.title: Estudify - Academic Management
case1.description: Full academic management platform built with Django and Django REST Framework. Includes user roles, course management, grades, attendance, reports and optional Celery-based tasks.
case1.problem: Fragmented academic processes and manual administrative tasks
case1.solution: Web platform with role-based access, REST API, automated reports and an admin dashboard

django-libros.title: Biblioteca Digital - Library Management
django-libros.description: Professional Django application for managing books and authors with a classic library design (burgundy, cream and gold). Includes full CRUD, advanced search, filters, pagination and a customized admin.
django-libros.problem: Manual management of books and authors, scattered records and no dedicated admin UX.
django-libros.solution: Relational Author-Book models, validated forms, advanced search and Bootstrap UI with CBV architecture and environment-based settings.

chromamind.title: ChromaMind - Color Generator (Flutter)
chromamind.description: Flutter app that generates color palettes from natural language prompts (e.g. 'sunset navy blue') and returns RGB values with a short description. Includes copy-to-clipboard and local persistence.
chromamind.problem: Designers and developers need quick, descriptive color suggestions and copyable RGB values.
chromamind.solution: A small Flutter utility using Provider, color picker UI and optional Google Generative AI to create descriptive color palettes. Persist preferences with SharedPreferences.

turno-track.title: Asistión (TurnoTrack) - Attendance & Geolocation
turno-track.description: Mobile attendance system built with Flutter and Supabase: photo-verified check-ins, OpenStreetMap integration, offline-sync and AI-driven insights via Gemini.
turno-track.problem: Manual attendance tracking with potential fraud and poor location validation.
turno-track.solution: Photo + GPS check-in/out, OpenStreetMap widget, Supabase with RLS policies, offline sync and Gemini AI for predictions and coaching.
turno-track.impact: Production-ready: secure RLS, dashboards and exports

profile.title: THE HUMAN BEHIND THE CODE

formation.title: Training and experience
formation.content: Software Engineering student at Universidad Cooperativa de Colombia with 2 years of practical experience. I've been a university teaching assistant, guiding students in technical concepts and collaborating on institutional projects.

methodologies.title: Methodologies and leadership
methodologies.content: Specialized in Scrum and agile methodologies, SOLID and KISS principles, with experience leading small teams in implementing best practices. Focus on comprehensive technical documentation and basic mentoring.

personal.title: The Human Being
personal.intro: Hi! I'm Nicolás Alejandro García Pasmiño. Throughout my life I've been called many names, so feel free to choose whichever you prefer. My hunger for knowledge didn't start at university, but much earlier, with a robotics course at age 8, fueled by an insatiable curiosity for technology, physics, and video games.
personal.hobbies: When I'm not immersed in the world of code, you'll probably find me sharing a good coffee (I'm a coffee enthusiast!), training with friends, or simply seeking a good conversation. I believe the best ideas and connections are born from those authentic moments.

music.title: Music Lover
music.description: I enjoy everything from salsa and Spanish rock to pop, rap, and a variety of musical genres in several languages. Sometimes I dare to play the drums.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.description: Testimonials from colleagues and clients I've worked with

items.name: Tomás Benavides
items.text: Nicolás is a highly focused quality engineer with a unique ability to develop innovative solutions suited to complex contexts. As a teammate he stands out for genuine kindness, active listening and fostering a collaborative atmosphere — showing strong emotional intelligence and resilience that inspires others to overcome challenges with calm and optimism. I fully recommend him and would gladly work with him again, as his balanced approach helps build a more cohesive and productive team.

items.name: Johnatan Matheu Ruales Galvis
items.text: I've collaborated with Nicolás on academic and personal programming projects. I was impressed by his quick learning and adaptability to new tools, demonstrating a flexible mindset and curiosity that drives him to innovate. In team settings he handled key code areas and consistently supported others with clear, empathetic communication that eases tensions and boosts collective ideas. His solid technical foundation, resilience and collaborative focus make him a valuable addition to any group.

items.name: Natalie Julieta Benavides
items.text: Nicolás stands out for responsibility and technical skills, evident in how he approaches projects: he reliably meets deadlines while optimizing processes and seeking innovative improvements. His passion and creativity drive his enjoyment of learning, focusing on both personal growth and final outcomes. He is empathetic, respectful and collaborative, always willing to help and share knowledge, which strengthens team relationships and creates a motivating environment. His clarity and adaptability make him ideal for handling complex challenges with composure.
